title: Mongol roads and spread of the plague

content.prompt: Which of the following was the major contributing factor to the spread of the plague to Cairo, Beijing, and Florence in the fourteenth century?

choices.label: Indian Ocean trade routes connecting South Asia to China, Southeast Asia, and Europe
Trade along the Mongol road system across Central Asia
African trade routes connecting sub-Saharan Africa with Asia and Europe
